name: Caroline
result: Can you see the tail? The comet is on a trajectory â€“ and so are we. We need to avoid hitting both the comet and one of the tails, while we can go through the other.

name: Raymonde
result: I know you want to retrieve that frame, but it's too dangerous to leave the spaceship because of the radiation. We must use the space drone. To do this, use a secret code.

name: Hypatia
result: In a few minutes the EMP will hit your ship and anything electronic will be no more. You need to find a way to protect the ship
